issue.title: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'pyarrow._flight'
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5118](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5118). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
**import pyarrow.flight** returns
```java

ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'pyarrow._flight'
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5118?focusedCommentId=16810194) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
How did you install the package? If you installed from `pip` or `conda` please close the issue as we have not packaged Flight yet

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5118?focusedCommentId=16811705) by peter (peterdiskage):*
Yeah. Is there a timeline of when it will be packaged? Any instructions to build it from the source would be great as well.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5118?focusedCommentId=16814929) by David Li (lidavidm):*
`[~peterdiskage]` follow ARROW-3150 for when it will be packaged, <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/developers/cpp.rst#arrow-flight-rpc> for build instructions.
